thread.title: Romney to kick off Senate bid in Utah

title: Romney to kick off Senate bid in Utah
text:
Romney to kick off Senate bid in Utah 4:29pm IST - 02:17 
Former Republican presidential nominee Mitt Romney is expected to announced he'll run for the seat of retiring Senator Orrin Hatch of Utah. Romney was among Trump's chief critics during the 2016 campaign and could return to that role if elected to the Senate. .   
Former Republican presidential nominee Mitt Romney is expected to announced he'll run for the seat of retiring Senator Orrin Hatch of Utah. Romney was among Trump's chief critics during the 2016 campaign and could return to that role if elected to the Senate. .  //reut.rs/2EHmVwB
